subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Mike Trout, the reigning American League most valuable player, led his league in runs scored, R.B.I. and total bases. But he also led the A.L. in strikeouts, with 184.
snippet: Mike Trout, the reigning American League most valuable player, led his league in runs scored, R.B.I. and total bases. But he also led the A.L. in strikeouts, with 184.
